listitem.para: if not set, pluto is tolerant about missing or expired X.509 Certificate Revocation Lists (CRL's), and will allow peer certificates as long as they do not appear on an expired CRL. When this option is enabled, all connections with an expired or missing CRL will be denied. Active connections will be terminated at rekey time. This setup is more secure, but vulnerable to downtime if the CRL expires. Acceptable values are yes or no (the default). This option used to be called strictcrlpolicy.
